title: URGENT!!!! what is this font?
content:
Does anyone know what are these fonts in the attachement?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131052343/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_182.png) | 45.11 KB |
author: mayshek

comments.content:
Hi May,  
welcome to Typophile.

1. There’s a special [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131052343/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid) for that kind of requests.  
2. [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131052343/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")

For your question:  
#1 is [FF Meta Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131052343/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=meta).  
#2 is [FS Albert Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131052343/http:/www.fontsmith.com/fonts/fs-albert.cfm?tab=testdrive).  
F
